update sys_dict_detail
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_code = #{detailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_dict_detail set company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_code = #{detailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_name = #{detailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update sys_dict_detail t set t.status = #{status} where t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.company_code companyCode, t.item_code itemCode,f.item_name itemName, t.detail_code detailCode, t.detail_name detailName, t.status, t.remark, t.create_user createUser, t.create_time createTime, t.update_user updateUser, t.update_time updateTime from sys_dict_detail t,sys_dict_item f where t.item_code=f.item_code and t.id = #{id}
